Posts.Content: Oct 2, 2009 07:38PM Cinde wrote: I am 51 and I have 8 of 34 rads to go. I think the chemo has done me in, My feet, legs and hands burn, my feet are are always burning or freezing, I also have to have help getting out of bed, I am using a cane to walk with my balance is so out of wack. The rads have taken a toll on me to. I hope I can work thru the last 8. I took three days off this past week, It's getting tougher to work .I am on strong pain meds but they only take the edge off, which I am thankful for that.     I just want to live with no pain, I have been very strong thru all of this but I am really running on low and getting depressed, It's like will the pain and weakness ever go a away. I dont know what I would do if I couldnt work and didnt have insurance. I hate whinning!!!! Sorry ladies God Bless you all.....
Posts.Title: Still pain, when will it go away... Mamita49 lexislove

Posts.Content: Cinde wrote: This Post was deleted by Cinde. Cinde Dx 11/11/2008, ILC, 6cm+, Stage IIIA, Grade 3 Log in to post a reply
